item.title: Networking
item.description: What is Networking? Networking is essentially just how computers communicate with each other whether that be inside the same local network or across the world. A basic understanding of networking will be critical to having success in a cybersecurity related field. This portion of the guide provides resources for learning about the OSI model, different protocols and their associated ports, and an introduction to Wireshark. Networking basics OSI Model Protocols and Ports Common Protocols List Wireshark
